data.title: Control Energy And Budget Remotely
data.meta_description: Direct Energy Controls will install and integrate energy management systems to control energy and manage budget remotely. We are certified electrical contractors for all electric systems.
data.text:
To ensure the best solution, Direct Energy Controls follows a thorough, comprehensive process to deliver a control system installation or integration that is best suited for reducing expenses and improving the work environment. Besides automation and integration, we install electric panels, wiring, and fixtures as well as looking for other advanced technologies for energy conservation. Our goal is to provide a comprehensive, precise view of conservation possibilities, and perform a clean and correct installation so our clients will maximize savings potential.

Direct Energy Controls will work with architects, engineers and interior designers by reviewing prints and documenting the code, and LEED certification requirements. Our Technicians will recommend modifications for control integration opportunities in Energy Management Control Systems (EMCS), lighting control, and access control systems. Our objectives are to help reduce operating costs and optimize for best management and control practices required for meeting IAQ standards.

At Direct Energy Controls, our licensed, professional technicians will perform an evaluation of the overall operational costs and/or issues pertaining to the client's concerns. We evaluate the feasibility of integrating existing equipment, automation control sequences, HVAC design, energy usage, peak demand trends and other operational processes used for maintenance.

â¢ Evaluate the energy and maintenance cost history over the last year

â¢ Identify power feeds that may be metered improperly

â¢ The effectiveness of maintenance actions and condition of equipment

Direct Energy Controls manages the complete system installation from beginning to end by scheduling, dispatching and coordinating all service and equipment components required for each project. Our technicians work well with the engineers throughout the process to verify connectivity and apply necessary programming to confirm successful functionality of the control system integration. Finally, all systems including lighting control, HVAC Control, and energy management are typically integrated into a web-based portal for ease of access and control.

Direct Energy Controls conducts a complete project commissioning service to assure that all components are installed, tested, and operating according to the control system integration requirements. Our technicians practice specific techniques and procedures to confirm successful operation of every component from individual equipment functions to modules and complex systems. Our main goal is to provide a safe and orderly handover of the control system to the facility owner, and guarantee the quality of performance and reliability.
